rooms.description: A small entrance area with storage space for coats and shoes.
Combination of kitchen and living area designed in an open-plan layout. Features minimalist decor, ample natural light, and efficient use of space.
Spacious master bedroom with attached walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom, following Vastu principles for the north-east direction for positive energy.
Sleek child bedroom designed for privacy and comfort.
Expansive rooftop terrace with space for relaxation and social gatherings. Incorporates large garden elements as per Vastu guidelines for south-west exposure.
